content.rendered:
Directed by Anurag Basu. Shubzz.

Written by Amitabh Bhattacharya. Debatma Mandal. Samrat Chakraborty. Anurag Basu.

Cast Ranbir Kapoor(Jagga). Katrina Kaif(Shruti Sengupta). Saswata Chatterjee(Tutti Futti or Biplab Bagchi). Chitrak Bandyopadhyay(Debu). Sayani Gupta(Little Girl). Saravajeet Tiwari(Junior Jagga). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Bashir Alexander).Mir Sarwar. Jimmeey Sirole(Altaf). Saurabh Shukla(Investigator / Lawyer). Yulian Caesar(Russian Dancer (as Yulian Shchukin)). Sarika Singh(Student).Bijou Thaangjam.Denzil Smith. Akshay Bhagat(Hostel Cook). Samrat Chakraborty(Samrat). Rajatabha Dutta(Inspector (as Rajatava Datta)). Ashish Gole(Reporter). Govinda(Scene Deleted). Tanya Haldar(Cameo). Mahmood Hashmi(Politician). Amit Jairath(Arms Dealer). Kapil Kashyap(Bagchi’ s Friend (as Kapil Sharma)). Shubhanshu Kesharwani(Shubhanshu Kesharwani (voice) (credit only)). Faiz Khan(Milk man). Sohrab Khandelwal(News Anchor). Harsh Khurana(Bagchi’s Colleague). Richard Bhakti Klein(Corrupt General (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)). Ivan Rodrigues(Mr. Ahuja). Harsh Shashwat(Digital support). Ajay Kumar Singh(Police officer). Kiran Srinivas(Akash). Chittaranjan Tripathy(PE Teacher (Mr. Bahadur)). Anirudh Walia(Student)

Languages Hindi.

Producers Vivekanand Ahuja. Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Jamal Araissi. Abdelmajid Ballouty. Anurag Basu. Tani Basu. Mehboob Bawa. Hormazd Bhandari. Noorie Hassan. Ranbir Kapoor. Siddharth Roy Kapur. Amrita Pandey. Bimal Parekh.

Production Pictureshuru Entertainment. Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
